attributes.action: GCSE should not be made harder
attributes.background: Students are getting harder exams and it's becoming hard to get a decent courier most students are not capable to do this and it is very unfair.As GCSE are getting hard,people will need help from the council for some needed benefits this can lead to uk losing money.This cna affect later generations.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
